name: Star Boars
description:
Star Boars is another small game that I whipped up in a few hours based solely on the "Play on words" that is the title. This game is an auto-scroller and the goal is to reach an arbitrary high score, just like the good ol' days!

While I gear up for Game Jam's such as Ludum Dare, these are the type of games I make for practice. Someday I will release one of my big gems! (check out "Fortuneless Studios" on Facebook to follow along!)

Engine: Unity 3D

Music: Made by me with FL Studio

Art & Models: Mostly made by me, with some help from a few sample textures. (Using a combination of Paint and Inkscape).
